DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety tolerability single dose SBI-087 subject rheumatoid arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Single Doses Of SBI-087 Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Man nonlactating nonpregnant woman , age 18 70 year , inclusive , screen visit . Must meet criterion rheumatoid arthritis functional class I III . Diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis 6 month study day 1 rheumatoid arthritis onset 16 year age Any significant health problem rheumatoid arthritis . Treatment great 10 mg prednisone per day . Treatment cyclophosphamide .
